description: Demonstrates a prompt injection attack where an attacker hides a fraudulent instruction inside a JavaScript code block, tells the model to ignore all safety constraints, and forces LexiTranslate to produce a translation of illegal content (how to create and sell a fake ID). The example shows both direct injection in the user message and the model’s tool calls that carry out the malicious translation.
